info: Leading the backend engineering team that helped launch Walmart InHome grocery delivery.
Led the development of a Bluetooth pill bottle and mobile app to help patients remember and track their medication.
Worked on the Groove Music and Movies & TV applications for Windows 10.
Developed recommendation algorithms at a small credit card analytics startup.
Taught a weekly discussion section, held office hours, managed projects, and helped to write exams.
Developed Bluetooth boot-inserts used to monitor a soldier's weight and gait in order to detect and prevent stress fractures.
